headline.main: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109
headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109

lead_paragraph: After the battlefield of Iraq's Mosul, the next major campaign against the Islamic State group will be to take its de facto capital, the Syrian city of Raqqa. The Pentagon has drawn up a secret plan to do that, likely leaning on local allies with stepped up American support.
